comments.body: Depending on your strengths (subjects that you are good at) and choose between 2 and 4. If you are passionate about CS go with PES. If it would have been any Electrical based branch in Surathkal then I would have given vote to that.
I mostly wanna go for masters in cs
Then go for PES without hesitation. With KCET, fees also will be low, so overall ROI is good compared to other options.
isn't csab over, how are you gonna go to nitk civil/agartala now?
LoL, may be OP is trying check whether he/she took the right decision :-)
